= Introduction =

This list of features is used to make a fast test without administrative overhead.

= Features =

This list is all the features implemented into nDoctor:

 * Patient data
  * Save
  * Undo
  * Add
   * Doctor
   * Specialisation
   * Insurance
   * Reputation
   * Practice
   * Profession
 * Medical records
  * Save
  * Add
   * Record
   * Directory
  * Edit a record
  * Edit macros
   * Add a new macro
   * Edit an existing macro
   * Remove a macro

 [`Work in progress...`]
